How much faster can a bi turbo muffler make your moped go?
In: SciTech › Automotive
Rate This Answer
With no other changes on a bike in perfect tune, switching the stock muffler for a performance exhaust will add near 5 to 10 mph.. Some drawbacks are it's loud, the engine is under more stress (higher RPMs), the rest of the bike is built for 30 mph! Answered
